tool_description: Get Google Search results in JSON format. Several parameters to set country, language, number of results. Get all SERP data through this API.
name: Google Search API
title: Google Search API

api_list.name: Search
api_list.description: Get search results for Google search keyword query. Customize your results using various parameters

optional_parameters.name: num
optional_parameters.description: Number of results. If empty, defaults to 10

optional_parameters.name: start
optional_parameters.description: Defines how many results to skip. You can enter start= in your google URL to check this. For 2nd page of results, you would use start=10. If empty, defaults to 0

optional_parameters.name: html
optional_parameters.description: You can choose to get the full page HTML of google page in your result

optional_parameters.name: uule
optional_parameters.description: Google's UULE param allows you to specify where the results should be gotten. You have to calculate the UULE yourself and pass it here. We will be adding a location param soon where you can just enter the name of the location and we will calculate UULE ourselves (New York, NY, USA)

optional_parameters.name: language
optional_parameters.description: Full language name. E.g. English, Italian, Hindi, Spanish, etc

optional_parameters.name: device
optional_parameters.description: Either 'desktop' or 'mobile'. Google displays different results based on device so choose the one you care about. If empty, defaults to 'desktop'

optional_parameters.name: country
optional_parameters.description: Full name of the country (e.g. United States, Canada, Germany, etc.). This will return results based on that specific country's google tld (.ca, .co.uk, .de).
